data.system_settings: W10 x64 Latest Canary. **ANOTHER NOTE: Only reproducable on W10 versions before the Creators Update, so do not deny if you have the CU**
data.actual_result: User's profile picture shows as the taskbar icon that is used for what client you are using, Canary, Stable, or PTB **NOTE: This is not a case of a corrupted cache. This has happened to multiple users, and multiple caches can't just corrupt the same way multiple times.**
data.expected_result: User's profile picture shows perfectly in the desktop notification
data.short_description: Users profile pictures don't always show
